posts.post_title: WTB: B18 Miller Brook Blue Infield
posts.post_content: Looking for B18 Blanket Miller Brooklyn Blue Infield in nice condition

I have one, but I'm not sure I want to sell.  Of course, if you make me an offer I can't refuse ;)
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/imoverhere/prewar/b18/huge/14b18_MillerO2.jpg[/IMG]
